com.flopsar.api.agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flopsar.api.agent.Agent

  • public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Agent class which allows submitting user defined metric data to the Flopsar Database.
    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setupLogger

        public static void setupLogger(java.lang.String loggerDirectory,
                               int logSize,
                               com.flopsar.api.AbstractLoggerLevel level)
        Sets up logging.
        Parameters:
        loggerDirectory - Path to a directory, which logs will be stored in.
        logSize - Log size in mega bytes.
        level - Logger level.

      • createConnection

        public static Agent createConnection(java.lang.String flopsarId,
                                     java.net.InetSocketAddress address,
                                     long outboundQueueSize)
        Creates a new Agent object and connects to Flopsar Manager asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        flopsarId - Agent identifier. Must be unique across all agents of this type.
        address - Socket address of the Manager.
        outboundQueueSize - Size in MB of the data outbound queue.
        Returns:
        Agent object.

      • close

        public final void close()
        Closes all the connections.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Checks if a connection to the manager is established.
        Returns:
        true if the agent is connected to the manager, otherwise false.

      • submitAsKV

        public final void submitAsKV(java.lang.String key,
                             long timestamp,
                             long value)
        Submits a key-value metric to a database.
        Parameters:
        key - Metric key.
        timestamp - Metric timestamp.
        value - Metric value.

      • buildKey

        public final java.lang.String buildKey(java.lang.String... element)
        Builds a valid KV data key from a set of elements.
        Parameters:
        element - Array of elements.
        Returns:
        KV data key that can be used as the key argument of the submitAsKV method.

      • submitAsStack

        public final void submitAsStack(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String signature,
                                long timestamp,
                                int duration,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        Submits a metric, that is represented as a root call.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the metric.
        signature - Signature of the metric.
        timestamp - Timestamp of the metric.
        duration - Duration time in milliseconds of the metric.
        parameters - a map of parameters in a form of key-value.
